name: Grafik
tagline: Website designer in Wellington, New Zealand
description:
Grafik is a small design and development studio based in Wellington, New Zealand. We specialize in smart and effective websites. We think, invent, challenge and focus. We remove noise to add value. Our work is carefully crafted, honest and aims to exceed expectations.
Currently servicing clients, agencies, and collaborators from around the globe as they build businesses.

locations.address: Mount Cook Police Barracks, 13 Buckle St.
